channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Resilient Internet connectivity in Europe mitigates impact from multiple cable cuts】欧洲的弹性互联网连接减轻了多次电缆中断的影响
item.description: 【 Two recent cable cuts that occurred in the Baltic Sea resulted in little-to-no observable impact to the affected countries, in large part because of the significant redundancy and resilience of Internet infrastructure in Europe. 】最近在波罗的海发生的两次电缆中断对受影响国家几乎没有产生明显的影响，这在很大程度上是因为欧洲互联网基础设施的大量冗余和恢复能力。

item.title: 【Robotcop: enforcing your robots.txt policies and stopping bots before they reach your website】Robotcop：执行您的 robots.txt 政策并在机器人到达您的网站之前将其阻止
item.description: 【 Today, the AI Audit dashboard gets an upgrade: you can now quickly see which AI services are honoring your robots.txt policies and then automatically enforce the policies against those that aren’t. 】今天，AI 审核仪表板进行了升级：您现在可以快速查看哪些 AI 服务遵守您的 robots.txt 策略，然后自动针对那些不遵守的 AI 服务强制执行这些策略。

item.title: 【Bigger and badder: how DDoS attack sizes have evolved over the last decade】更大更坏：DDoS 攻击规模在过去十年中如何演变
item.description: 【 If we plot the metrics associated with large DDoS attacks observed in the last 10 years, does it show a straight, steady increase in an exponential curve that keeps becoming steeper, or is it closer to a linear growth? Our analysis found the growth is not linear but rather is exponential, with the slope varying depending on the metric (rps, pps or bps). 】如果我们绘制与过去 10 年观察到的大型 DDoS 攻击相关的指标，它是否显示出指数曲线的直线、稳定增长并不断变得陡峭，还是更接近线性增长？我们的分析发现，增长不是线性的，而是呈指数增长，斜率根据指标（rps、pps 或 bps）而变化。

item.title: 【From deals to DDoS: exploring Cyber Week 2024 Internet trends】从交易到 DDoS：探索 2024 年网络周互联网趋势
item.description: 【 How significant are Cyber Week shopping days on the Internet? Is it a global phenomenon? Does E-commerce interest peak on Black Friday or Cyber Monday, and are attacks increasing during this time? We try to answer these questions and more. 】网络周网上购物日有多重要？这是一个全球现象吗？电子商务兴趣是否在黑色星期五或网络星期一达到顶峰，并且在此期间攻击是否有所增加？我们试图回答这些问题以及更多问题。

item.title: 【From ChatGPT to Temu: ranking top Internet services in 2024】从ChatGPT到Temu：2024年顶级互联网服务排名
item.description: 【 The 2024 popular Internet services landscape highlights rising generative AI, e-commerce shifts, and the continued dominance of platforms like Google and Facebook, as revealed by Cloudflare’s rankings 】Cloudflare 的排名显示，2024 年流行的互联网服务格局凸显了生成式人工智能的崛起、电子商务的转变以及 Google 和 Facebook 等平台的持续主导地位

item.title: 【How we prevent conflicts in authoritative DNS configuration using formal verification】我们如何使用形式验证来防止权威 DNS 配置中的冲突
item.description: 【 We describe how Cloudflare uses a custom Lisp-like programming language and formal verifier (written in Racket and Rosette) to prevent logical contradictions in our authoritative DNS nameserver’s behavior. 】我们描述了 Cloudflare 如何使用自定义的类似 Lisp 的编程语言和形式验证器（用 Racket 和 Rosette 编写）来防止我们的权威 DNS 域名服务器行为中的逻辑矛盾。

item.title: 【Cloudflare incident on November 14, 2024, resulting in lost logs】2024年11月14日Cloudflare事件，导致日志丢失
item.description: 【 On November 14, 2024, Cloudflare experienced a Cloudflare Logs outage, impacting the majority of customers using these products. During the ~3.5 hours that these services were impacted, about 55% of the logs we normally send to customers were not sent and were lost. The details of what went wrong and why are interesting both for customers and practitioners. 】2024 年 11 月 14 日，Cloudflare 发生了 Cloudflare Logs 中断，影响了大多数使用这些产品的客户。在这些服务受到影响的约 3.5 小时内，我们通常发送给客户的日志中约有 55% 未发送并丢失。对于客户和从业者来说，问题的细节和原因都很有趣。

item.title: 【What’s new in Cloudflare: Account Owned Tokens and Zaraz Automated Actions】Cloudflare 的新增功能：账户拥有的代币和 Zaraz 自动操作
item.description: 【 Cloudflare customers can now create Account Owned Tokens , allowing more flexibility around access control for their Cloudflare services. Additionally, Zaraz Automation Actions streamlines event tracking and third-party tool integration. 】Cloudflare 客户现在可以创建帐户拥有的令牌，从而为 Cloudflare 服务的访问控制提供更大的灵活性。此外，Zaraz Automation Actions 还简化了事件跟踪和第三方工具集成。

item.title: 【DO it again: how we used Durable Objects to add WebSockets support and authentication to AI Gateway】再做一遍：我们如何使用 Durable Objects 向 AI Gateway 添加 WebSockets 支持和身份验证
item.description: 【 We used Cloudflare’s Developer Platform and Durable Objects to build authentication and a WebSockets API that developers can use to call AI Gateway, enabling continuous communication over a single 】我们使用 Cloudflare 的开发者平台和 Durable Objects 来构建身份验证和 WebSockets API，开发者可以使用该 API 来调用 AI 网关，从而实现通过单个

item.title: 【Cloudflare 2024 Year in Review】Cloudflare 2024 年回顾
item.description: 【 The 2024 Cloudflare Radar Year in Review is our fifth annual review of Internet trends and patterns at both a global and country/region level. 】2024 年 Cloudflare Radar 年度回顾是我们对全球和国家/地区层面的互联网趋势和模式的第五次年度回顾。
